solution_line_template: If tickets are valued at ${value_per_ticket} then in total, Taegan has won ${total_value_of_tickets} in total tickets / ${value_per_ticket} per ticket = <<{total_value_of_tickets}/{value_per_ticket}={total_tickets_won}>>{total_tickets_won} tickets.

Some of these tickets were found so only {total_tickets_won} total tickets - {found_tickets} found tickets = <<{total_tickets_won}-{found_tickets}={tickets_from_games}>>{tickets_from_games} tickets were won from carnival games.
She therefore won {tickets_from_games} tickets / {number_of_games} carnival games = <<{tickets_from_games}/{number_of_games}={tickets_per_game}>>{tickets_per_game} ticket from each game.
